name: Tazer
description:
Tazer gives you the control of a small robot in a dark labyrinth. Your robot has to survive by sending electric waves to eliminate every other robots. But each attack comes with a price: showing your position to the other players !

Number of players: 2 to 4

It can be play by 2 persons with a keyboard:

  • W,S,A,D,E (attack/join the game), R (bonus), T (boost)
  • Up, Down, Left, Right, I (attack/join the game), O (bonus), P (boost)

And up to 4 players with Xbox 360/Xbox One controllers (with buttons A, X, B).

Press "Enter" to start the game.

Note: For French players, Z, S, Q, D works too =).
